short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HARO Helper - Submit HARO pitches with one click using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HARO HELPER allows users to easily create pitches for reporters in just a few clicks with the help of ChatGPT. From the HARO daily email in your inbox, simply highlight the text you want to pitch and select 'Create HARO Pitch' from the right-click menu. The extension, with the help of AI will generate 4 pitch versions to choose from.
